Articles.Content:
Hey guys. I built another Fighter Jet! Mainly built to replace the Ataraxia, Nirv is a very stable and capable craft. It is maneuverable, and has advanced Vtol function.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I know that the imgur embedding is wierd, so heres the link to imgur website:

http://imgur.com/a/tZ6uI

Here's a cool video I made about it one my youtube channel:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w_shN50rJq0

Download:

http://download1582./r69ubdjk4d2g/od95qztocsytyzf/Fighter+_Nirv_.craft

Edited October 19, 2014 by manni01
This aircraft is amazing!!! I love it.

Thanks

btw, I have way more on my main thread:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96695-Hexdragon-Enterprises-Jets-Vtols-SSTO-s-I-ve-got-em-all%21

(I'll think about arcadia)

Incredible fighter, incredible maneuvers! I will never be able to do things like that with my own VTOLs.

Downloading now...
